title: Hero
lyrics: I could not rise for fear of the fall, so I fell silent when you called. The knock on my door echoed through empty halls. I ain’t your hero. I won’t be there for you. I ain’t your hero. I won’t be there for you. I’m terrified of the silence in here. I’m terrified of what I might hear. Like a ringing of glass, cracks form; I shatter with fear. I ain’t your hero. I won’t be there for you. I ain’t your hero. I won’t be there for you. I ain’t your goddamn knight in goddamn shining armor. I ain’t your…your hero…your hero. I ain’t your hero. I ain’t your hero. I ain’t your hero. I ain’t your hero. I ain’t your hero. I ain’t your hero.
